animeTitle: Natsume Yuujinchou Itsuka Yuki no Hi ni OVA
otherNames: 夏目友人帳 新作OVA いつかゆきのひに
synopsis: During a winter walk, Natsume Takashi meets a snowman yokai who is searching for something she is lost and cannot seem to recall and decides to help her despite not knowing what exactly she is looking for.
